verses.roman:
maṇḍalī-bandhe gopī-gaṇa karena nartana
madhye rādhā-saha nāce vrajendra-nandana

synonyms: maṇḍalī-bandhe—in a circle; gopī-gaṇa—the gopīs; karena nartana—engaged in dancing; madhye—in the middle; rādhā-saha—with Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; nāce—dances; vrajendra-nandana—Kṛṣṇa, the son of Mahārāja Nanda.
translation: The gopīs were dancing in a circle, and in the middle of that circle, Kṛṣṇa, the son of Mahārāja Nanda, danced with Rādhārāṇī.
